name: Swarmlake
description:
Swarmlake is a challenging, small FPS about fighting 10,000 enemies at once with the only goal of beating your highscore.

  • Simple: Collect shards from the ever-growing swarm to score
  • Vertical: Shoot into the ground or close enemies to fly skywards
  • Explosive: Collide with pink bombs to take out all close enemies
  • Challenging: All enemies as well as you are defeated in one hit
  • Handcrafted: Custom-made optimized engine and original theme song
  • Intense: Music visualization and 10,000 enemies in an infinite arena
  • Fun: Tight controls, instant action, fair enemies and no randomness
